text: Have you not seen towards those who indulged in hypocrisy? They say for their brothren who have disbelieved from among the possessors of Al-Kitab: 'Surely, if you are expelled, without a shadow of doubt we would move away alongwith you people and we will not obey about you (i.e., against you) any one, ever. And if you are subjected to Qital, surely we will come to your aid'. And Allah gives testimony: "Surely they, indeed, are liars
